This doesn't require an action, but it can only be done before or after an action, and only once per turn. If you already performed a different dance during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new dance is reduced to 5 mp. Some dances are instantaneous and resolve immediately, while others have effects that last until the start of your next turn.
es: Each time you take this Skill, you learn a dance. On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no martial armor equipped, you may spend 10 mp to perform a dance you have learned. This doesn't require an action, but it can only be done before or after an action, and only once per turn. If you already performed a different dance during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new dance is reduced to 5 mp. Some dances are instantaneous and resolve immediately, while others have effects that last until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esta Habilidade, você aprende uma dança. No seu turno, durante uma cena de conflito, se você não tiver nenhuma armadura marcial equipada, você poderá gastar 10 PM para executar uma dança que aprendeu. Isso não requer uma ação, mas só pode ser feito antes ou depois de uma ação e apenas uma vez por turno. Se você já executou uma dança diferente no turno anterior nesta cena, o custo da nova dança é reduzido para 5 PM. Algumas danças são instantâneas e resolvem imediatamente, enquanto outras têm efeitos que duram até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: When you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a Bond of affection: apply the benefits of the dance to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of your next turn).
it: Quando esegui una **danza** con **durata** “Fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno”, puoi spendere 10 Punti Mente addizionali. Se lo fai, scegli un alleato a te visibile verso cui hai un Legame di **affetto**: applichi i benefici della tua **danza** anche a quell’alleato (tali benefici terminano comunque all’inizio del **tuo** prossimo turno).
de: When you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a Bond of affection: apply the benefits of the dance to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of your next turn).
pl: When you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a Bond of affection: apply the benefits of the dance to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of your next turn).
fr: When you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a Bond of affection: apply the benefits of the dance to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of your next turn).
es: When you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a Bond of affection: apply the benefits of the dance to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of your next turn).
pt-BR: Ao realizar uma dança com duração de “Até o início do seu próximo turno”, você pode gastar 10 PM. Se o fizer, escolha um aliado que você possa ver e com quem você tenha um Laço de afeição: aplique os benefícios da dança a esse aliado e também a você mesmo (os benefícios ainda duram até o início do seu próximo turno).

en: After you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL × 2】 to all Opposed Checks that rely on acrobatics, coordination, or speed until the start of your next turn.
it: Dopo che esegui una **danza** con **durata** “Fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno”, ottieni un bonus pari a 【**LA × 2**】 a tutti i Test Contrapposti basati su **acrobazie, coordinazione** o **rapidità** fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: After you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL × 2】 to all Opposed Checks that rely on acrobatics, coordination, or speed until the start of your next turn.
pl: After you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL × 2】 to all Opposed Checks that rely on acrobatics, coordination, or speed until the start of your next turn.
fr: After you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL × 2】 to all Opposed Checks that rely on acrobatics, coordination, or speed until the start of your next turn.
es: After you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL × 2】 to all Opposed Checks that rely on acrobatics, coordination, or speed until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Depois de realizar uma dança com duração de “Até o início do seu próximo turno”, você ganha um bônus igual a 【NH × 2】 para todos os Testes Opostos que dependem de acrobacia, coordenação ou velocidade até o início do seu próximo turno .

en: After you perform a dance, you may perform the Equipment action for free.
it: Dopo che esegui una **danza**, puoi eseguire **gratuitamente** l’azione di **Equipaggiamento**.
de: After you perform a dance, you may perform the Equipment action for free.
pl: After you perform a dance, you may perform the Equipment action for free.
fr: After you perform a dance, you may perform the Equipment action for free.
es: After you perform a dance, you may perform the Equipment action for free.
pt-BR: Depois de executar uma dança, você poderá realizar a ação de Equipamento gratuitamente.

en: After you perform a dance, your attacks with brawling, dagger, flail, and thrown weapons deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an arcane weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn.
it: Dopo che esegui una danza, i tuoi attacchi con armi della Categoria **flagello, da lancio, pugnale** e **da rissa** infliggono 【**LA**】 danni extra fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno; inoltre, se hai un’arma **arcana** equipaggiata, gli incantesimi offensivi (⚡) da te lanciati infliggono 【**LA**】 danni extra fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: After you perform a dance, your attacks with brawling, dagger, flail, and thrown weapons deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an arcane weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn.
pl: After you perform a dance, your attacks with brawling, dagger, flail, and thrown weapons deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an arcane weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn.
fr: After you perform a dance, your attacks with brawling, dagger, flail, and thrown weapons deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an arcane weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn.
es: After you perform a dance, your attacks with brawling, dagger, flail, and thrown weapons deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an arcane weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Depois de executar uma dança, seus ataques com armas de briga, adaga, mangual e arremesso causam 【NH】 dano extra até o início do seu próximo turno. Se você tiver uma arma arcana equipada, os feitiços ofensivos (⚡) que você lançar também causarão 【NH】 dano extra até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: If an ally bears one of your symbols, that ally may perform the Spell action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those you know, as long as it has a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 10】 (that ally must still pay the MP cost).
it: Se un alleato ha un tuo **simbolo** impresso su di sé, quell’alleato può eseguire l’azione di **Incantesimo** e distruggere quel **simbolo** per lanciare un qualsiasi incantesimo che tu conosci, a patto che abbia un **costo totale in Punti Mente pari o inferiore a** 【**LA × 10**】 (quell’alleato deve comunque pagarne il costo con i propri Punti Mente).
de: If an ally bears one of your symbols, that ally may perform the Spell action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those you know, as long as it has a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 10】 (that ally must still pay the MP cost).
pl: If an ally bears one of your symbols, that ally may perform the Spell action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those you know, as long as it has a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 10】 (that ally must still pay the MP cost).
fr: If an ally bears one of your symbols, that ally may perform the Spell action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those you know, as long as it has a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 10】 (that ally must still pay the MP cost).
es: If an ally bears one of your symbols, that ally may perform the Spell action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those you know, as long as it has a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 10】 (that ally must still pay the MP cost).
pt-BR: Se um aliado possuir um de seus símbolos, esse aliado pode realizar a ação de Feitiço e destruir esse símbolo para lançar um único feitiço entre aqueles que você conhece, desde que tenha um custo total de Pontos Mentais igual ou inferior a 【NH × 10】 (esse aliado ainda deve pagar o custo de PM).

en: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create sight-based illusions.
it: Puoi eseguire Rituali i cui effetti rientrino nella disciplina di **Ritualismo**; in più, puoi usare il **Ritualismo** per creare **illusioni basate sulla vista**.
de: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create sight-based illusions.
pl: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create sight-based illusions.
fr: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create sight-based illusions.
es: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create sight-based illusions.
pt-BR: Você ganha a habilidade de realizar Rituais da disciplina Ritualismo; além disso, você pode usar Ritualismo para criar ilusões baseadas na visão.

en: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your symbols suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer 【SL】 extra damage or recover 【SL】 additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
it: Quando una creatura a te visibile su cui è impresso un tuo **simbolo** subisce danno o recupera Punti Vita e/o Punti Mente, puoi far sì che quella creatura subisca 【**LA**】 danni extra o recuperi rispettivamente 【**LA**】 Punti Vita e/o Punti Mente addizionali.
de: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your symbols suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer 【SL】 extra damage or recover 【SL】 additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
pl: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your symbols suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer 【SL】 extra damage or recover 【SL】 additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
fr: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your symbols suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer 【SL】 extra damage or recover 【SL】 additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
es: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your symbols suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer 【SL】 extra damage or recover 【SL】 additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
pt-BR: Quando uma criatura que você pode ver que carrega um de seus símbolos sofre dano ou recupera Pontos de Vida e/ou Pontos Mentais, você pode fazer com que essa criatura sofra 【NH】 dano extra ou recupere 【NH】 Pontos de Vida e/ou Pontos Mentais adicionais, respectivamente).

en: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your symbols, as long as that creature is within 2 travel days of your position.
it: Conosci l’esatta direzione in cui si trova qualsiasi creatura su cui sia impresso uno dei tuoi **simboli**, a patto che essa si trovi entro **2 giorni di viaggio** da te.
de: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your symbols, as long as that creature is within 2 travel days of your position.
pl: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your symbols, as long as that creature is within 2 travel days of your position.
fr: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your symbols, as long as that creature is within 2 travel days of your position.
es: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your symbols, as long as that creature is within 2 travel days of your position.
pt-BR: Você sempre sabe a direção exata em que encontrará qualquer criatura com um de seus símbolos, desde que essa criatura esteja a 2 dias de viagem de sua posição.

en: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn two symbols. You may have up to 【SL + 1】 symbols active at the same time; if you create more while at your limit, you must first choose and destroy some of your previous symbols. You may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to create a symbol you have learned and choose one option: apply that symbol to yourself; OR apply that symbol to an ally you can see; OR perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen symbol to each enemy hit by the attack (each copy counts as a separate symbol towards your limit or 【 SL + 1】 active symbols).
it: Ogni volta che acquisisci questa Abilità, impari **due simboli**. Puoi avere **fino a** 【**LA + 1**】 **simboli attivi allo stesso tempo**; se crei **simboli** in eccesso, devi prima scegliere e distruggere altrettanti **simboli** da te creati in precedenza. Puoi eseguire l’azione di **Inventario** e spendere 2 Punti Inventario per creare un **simbolo** tra quelli che conosci e scegliere un’opzione: imprimi il **simbolo** su te stesso; **oppure** imprimi il **simbolo** su un alleato a te visibile; **oppure** esegui un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata. L’attacco non infligge danno, ma imprimi una copia del **simbolo** su ciascun nemico colpito (ogni copia conta come un **simbolo** separato ai fini del limite).
de: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn two symbols. You may have up to 【SL + 1】 symbols active at the same time; if you create more while at your limit, you must first choose and destroy some of your previous symbols. You may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to create a symbol you have learned and choose one option: apply that symbol to yourself; OR apply that symbol to an ally you can see; OR perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen symbol to each enemy hit by the attack (each copy counts as a separate symbol towards your limit or 【 SL + 1】 active symbols).
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esta Habilidade, você aprende dois símbolos. Você pode ter até símbolos 【NH + 1】 ativos ao mesmo tempo; se você criar mais enquanto estiver no seu limite, primeiro você deve escolher e destruir alguns de seus símbolos anteriores. Você pode realizar a ação de Inventário e gastar 2 ip para criar um símbolo que aprendeu e escolher uma opção: aplicar esse símbolo a você mesmo; OU aplique esse símbolo a um aliado que você possa ver; OU execute um ataque livre com uma arma que você equipou. Este ataque não causa dano, mas você aplica uma cópia do símbolo escolhido a cada inimigo atingido pelo ataque (cada cópia conta como um símbolo separado para o seu limite ou 【NH + 1】 símbolos ativos).

en: At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose one ally who is able to hear you or one enemy you can see that is suffering from dazed, enraged, and/or shaken. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen creature becomes your focus. You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to Checks you perform to examine your focus, as well as to your Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include your focus among the targets. When you cause your focus to recover Hit Points and/or Mind Points, they recover 【SL × 2】 additional HP and/or MP, respectively.
it: All’inizio del tuo turno durante un conflitto, puoi scegliere un alleato in grado di sentirti **oppure** un nemico a te visibile che sia afflitto dallo status **confuso, furente** e/o **scosso**. Fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno, la creatura scelta diventa il tuo **focus**. Ottieni un bonus pari a 【**LA**】 ai Test che effettui per esaminare il tuo **focus**, nonché ai tuoi Test di Precisione e Test di Magia per attacchi e incantesimi offensivi (⚡) che includono il tuo **focus** tra i bersagli. Quando fai recuperare Punti Vita e/o Punti Mente al tuo **focus**, gli fai recuperare rispettivamente 【**LA × 2**】 PV e/o PM addizionali.
de: At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose one ally who is able to hear you or one enemy you can see that is suffering from dazed, enraged, and/or shaken. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen creature becomes your focus. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen creature becomes your focus. When you cause your focus to recover Hit Points and/or Mind Points, they recover 【SL × 2】 additional HP and/or MP, respectively.
pt-BR: No início do seu turno durante um conflito, você pode escolher um aliado que seja capaz de ouvi-lo ou um inimigo que você possa ver que esteja atordoado, enfurecido e/ou abalado. Até o início do seu próximo turno, a criatura escolhida se torna o seu foco. Você ganha um bônus igual a 【NH】 aos testes que você realiza para examinar seu foco, bem como aos seus testes de precisão e testes mágicos para ataques e feitiços ofensivos (⚡) que incluem seu foco entre os alvos. Quando você faz com que seu foco recupere Pontos de Vida e/ou Pontos Mentais, eles recuperam 【NH × 2】 PV e/ou PM adicionais, respectivamente.

en: The total MP cost of your spells and verses (High Fantasy, page 138) that include your focus among their targets is reduced by 【SL】, or by 【SL × 2】 if your focus is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
it: Il costo totale in Punti Mente dei tuoi **incantesimi** e **versi** che includono il tuo **focus** tra i bersagli è ridotto di 【**LA**】, oppure di 【**LA × 2**】 se il tuo **focus** è l’**unico** bersaglio (fino a un costo minimo di 0 Punti Mente).
de: The total MP cost of your spells and verses (High Fantasy, page 138) that include your focus among their targets is reduced by 【SL】, or by 【SL × 2】 if your focus is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
pl: The total MP cost of your spells and verses (High Fantasy, page 138) that include your focus among their targets is reduced by 【SL】, or by 【SL × 2】 if your focus is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
fr: The total MP cost of your spells and verses (High Fantasy, page 138) that include your focus among their targets is reduced by 【SL】, or by 【SL × 2】 if your focus is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
es: The total MP cost of your spells and verses (High Fantasy, page 138) that include your focus among their targets is reduced by 【SL】, or by 【SL × 2】 if your focus is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
pt-BR: O custo total de PM de seus feitiços e versos (Alta Fantasia, página 138) que incluem seu foco entre seus alvos é reduzido em 【NH】, ou em 【NH × 2】 se seu foco for o único alvo (até um custo mínimo de 0 Pontos Mentais).

en: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally within 1 travel day of you; you are able to hear each other for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline. Additionally, you may use Ritualism to transport creatures in and out of the soul network, and to gain information and track entities while inside the soul network.
it: Puoi comunicare telepaticamente con ciascun alleato non privo di sensi entro **1 giorno di viaggio** da te; siete **reciprocamente in grado di sentirvi** ai fini di Abilità ed effetti. Puoi eseguire Rituali i cui effetti rientrino nella disciplina di **Ritualismo; in più**, puoi usare il Ritualismo per **trasportare creature** dentro e fuori dalla rete spirituale, nonché per **ottenere informazioni** e seguire le tracce di entità all’interno della rete spirituale.
de: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally within 1 travel day of you; you are able to hear each other for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline. Additionally, you may use Ritualism to transport creatures in and out of the soul network, and to gain information and track entities while inside the soul network.
pl: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally within 1 travel day of you; you are able to hear each other for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline. Additionally, you may use Ritualism to transport creatures in and out of the soul network, and to gain information and track entities while inside the soul network.
fr: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally within 1 travel day of you; you are able to hear each other for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline. Additionally, you may use Ritualism to transport creatures in and out of the soul network, and to gain information and track entities while inside the soul network.
es: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally within 1 travel day of you; you are able to hear each other for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline. Additionally, you may use Ritualism to transport creatures in and out of the soul network, and to gain information and track entities while inside the soul network.
pt-BR: Você pode se comunicar telepaticamente com qualquer aliado consciente dentro de 1 dia de viagem; vocês são capazes de ouvir uns aos outros por causa de habilidades e efeitos. Você ganha a habilidade de realizar Rituais da disciplina Ritualismo. Além disso, você pode usar o Ritualismo para transportar criaturas para dentro e para fora da rede da alma e para obter informações e rastrear entidades enquanto estiver dentro da rede da alma.

en: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a gift.
it: Ogni volta che acquisisci questa Abilità, ottieni un **dono**.
de: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a gift.
pl: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a gift.
fr: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a gift.
es: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a gift.
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esta habilidade, você ganha um dom.

en: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with Willpower (such as 【DEX + WLP】 for a shortbow). Additionally, your melee attacks with weapons belonging to the arcane or sword Categories may target ﬂying creatures.
it: Quando effettui un Test di Precisione, puoi sostituire **uno** dei dadi di Caratteristica con **Volontà** (ad esempio 【**DES + VOL**】 per un **arco corto**). Inoltre, i tuoi attacchi in **mischia** con armi appartenenti alle Categorie **arcana** o **spada** possono bersagliare le creature **volanti**.
de: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with Willpower (such as 【DEX + WLP】 for a shortbow). Additionally, your melee attacks with weapons belonging to the arcane or sword Categories may target ﬂying creatures.
pl: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with Willpower (such as 【DEX + WLP】 for a shortbow). Additionally, your melee attacks with weapons belonging to the arcane or sword Categories may target ﬂying creatures.
fr: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with Willpower (such as 【DEX + WLP】 for a shortbow). Additionally, your melee attacks with weapons belonging to the arcane or sword Categories may target ﬂying creatures.
es: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with Willpower (such as 【DEX + WLP】 for a shortbow). Additionally, your melee attacks with weapons belonging to the arcane or sword Categories may target ﬂying creatures.
pt-BR: Ao realizar uma Verificação de Precisão, você pode substituir um dos dados de Atributo por Força de Vontade (como 【DES + VON】 para um arco curto). Além disso, seus ataques corpo a corpo com armas pertencentes às categorias arcano ou espada podem ter como alvo criaturas voadoras.

en: Your unarmed strikes deal 【6 + (SL × 2)】 extra damage, and you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to your Accuracy Checks with them. At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose a weapon Category other than brawling. If you do, your unarmed strikes now belong to the chosen Category; if you choose bow, firearm or thrown, they become ranged weapons instead of melee; if you choose dagger or sword, they cannot be used with Triple Slash (see High Fantasy Atlas, page 161). These changes last until the start of your next turn.
it: I tuoi **colpi senz’armi** infliggono 【**6 + (LA × 2)**】 danni extra e ottieni un bonus pari a 【**LA**】 ai tuoi Test di Precisione con essi. All’inizio del tuo turno durante un conflitto, puoi scegliere una Categoria di arma diversa da **rissa**. Se lo fai, i tuoi **colpi senz’armi** appartengono ora a quella Categoria; se scegli **arco, da fuoco** o **da lancio**, diventano armi a **distanza** anziché da **mischia**; se scegli pugnale o spada, non possono essere usati con **Triplo Fendente**. Questi cambiamenti terminano all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: Your unarmed strikes deal 【6 + (SL × 2)】 extra damage, and you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to your Accuracy Checks with them. At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose a weapon Category other than brawling. If you do, your unarmed strikes now belong to the chosen Category; if you choose bow, firearm or thrown, they become ranged weapons instead of melee; if you choose dagger or sword, they cannot be used with Triple Slash (see High Fantasy Atlas, page 161). These changes last until the start of your next turn.

These changes last until the start of your next turn.

At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose a weapon Category other than brawling. If you do, your unarmed strikes now belong to the chosen Category; if you choose bow, firearm or thrown, they become ranged weapons instead of melee; if you choose dagger or sword, they cannot be used with Triple Slash (see High Fantasy Atlas, page 161). These changes last until the start of your next turn.
es: Your unarmed strikes deal 【6 + (SL × 2)】 extra damage, and you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to your Accuracy Checks with them. At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose a weapon Category other than brawling. If you do, your unarmed strikes now belong to the chosen Category; if you choose bow, firearm or thrown, they become ranged weapons instead of melee; if you choose dagger or sword, they cannot be used with Triple Slash (see High Fantasy Atlas, page 161). These changes last until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Seus ataques desarmados causam 【6 + (NH × 2)】 de dano extra, e você ganha um bônus igual a 【NH】 em suas verificações de precisão com eles. No início do seu turno durante um conflito, você pode escolher uma categoria de arma diferente de briga. Se fizer isso, seus ataques desarmados agora pertencem à categoria escolhida; se você escolher arco, arma de fogo ou arremesso, eles se tornam armas de longo alcance em vez de corpo a corpo; se você escolher adaga ou espada, elas não poderão ser usadas com Corte Triplo (veja Atlas de Alta Fantasia, página 161). Essas mudanças duram até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in Crisis, you may recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points.
it: Dopo che un tuo attacco o incantesimo offensivo (⚡) fa sì che uno o più nemici perdano Punti Vita, se sei in **Crisi**, puoi recuperare 【**LA × 5**】 Punti Vita.
de: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in Crisis, you may recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points.
pl: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in Crisis, you may recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points.
fr: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in Crisis, you may recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points.
es: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in Crisis, you may recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points.
pt-BR: Após um de seus ataques ou feitiços ofensivos (⚡) fazer com que um ou mais inimigos percam Pontos de Vida, se você estiver em Crise, você poderá recuperar 【NH × 5】 Pontos de Vida.

en: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type other than physical, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
it: Dopo che una fonte di danno ti fa perdere Punti Vita, se quel danno aveva un tipo **diverso da fisico**, puoi spendere 10 PV per ottenere Resistenza a quel tipo di danno finché non usi di nuovo questa Abilità. Non puoi usare questa Abilità se farlo ridurrebbe a 0 i tuoi PV.
de: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type other than physical, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
pl: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type other than physical, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
fr: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type other than physical, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
es: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type other than physical, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
pt-BR: Depois de perder Pontos de Vida devido a dano, se esse dano tiver um tipo diferente de físico, você poderá gastar 10 PV para ganhar Resistência a esse tipo de dano até usar esta Habilidade novamente. Você não pode usar esta habilidade se isso reduziria seu PV a 0.

en: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their Species and the GM chooses 【SL】 therioforms appropriate to those NPCs (see next page): if you have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those therioforms (even if they are not among those you have learned).
it: Quando infliggi danno a uno o più PNG, scopri la loro **Specie** e il GM sceglie 【**LA**】 **terioforme** che ritiene tematiche per quei PNG: se possiedi l’Abilità **Teriomorfosi**, puoi immediatamente usarla, pagando il relativo costo in PV per manifestarle (anche se non sono tra quelle che hai imparato).
de: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their Species and the GM chooses 【SL】 therioforms appropriate to those NPCs (see next page): if you have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those therioforms (even if they are not among those you have learned).
pl: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their Species and the GM chooses 【SL】 therioforms appropriate to those NPCs (see next page): if you have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those therioforms (even if they are not among those you have learned).
fr: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their Species and the GM chooses 【SL】 therioforms appropriate to those NPCs (see next page): if you have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those therioforms (even if they are not among those you have learned).
es: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their Species and the GM chooses 【SL】 therioforms appropriate to those NPCs (see next page): if you have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those therioforms (even if they are not among those you have learned).
pt-BR: Quando você causa dano a um ou mais PNJs, você aprende suas Espécies e o Mestre escolhe 【NH】 as terioformas apropriadas para esses PNJs (veja a próxima página): se você adquiriu a Habilidade Teriomorfose, você pode pagar imediatamente seu custo de PV e usá-la para manifestar essas terioformas (mesmo que não estejam entre aquelas que você aprendeu).

en: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a therioform. You may use an action and spend one third of your current Hit Points (rounded down) to manifest the effects of up to two therioforms you have learned. The details of this transformation are explained on the next page.
it: Ogni volta che acquisici questa Abilità, impari una **terioforma**. Puoi usare un’azione e spendere **un terzo dei tuoi Punti Vita attuali** (arrotondato per difetto) per manifestare gli effetti di **fino a due terioforme** tra quelle che hai imparato.
de: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a therioform. You may use an action and spend one third of your current Hit Points (rounded down) to manifest the effects of up to two therioforms you have learned. The details of this transformation are explained on the next page.
pl: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a therioform. You may use an action and spend one third of your current Hit Points (rounded down) to manifest the effects of up to two therioforms you have learned. The details of this transformation are explained on the next page.
fr: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a therioform. You may use an action and spend one third of your current Hit Points (rounded down) to manifest the effects of up to two therioforms you have learned. The details of this transformation are explained on the next page.
es: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a therioform. You may use an action and spend one third of your current Hit Points (rounded down) to manifest the effects of up to two therioforms you have learned. The details of this transformation are explained on the next page.
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esta Habilidade, você aprende uma terioforma. Você pode usar uma ação e gastar um terço de seus Pontos de Vida atuais (arredondados para baixo) para manifestar os efeitos de até duas terioformas que você aprendeu. Os detalhes dessa transformação são explicados na próxima página.

en: As long as there is no one aboard your personal vehicle, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your personal vehicle is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to have the vehicle appear near you and enter it for free.
it: Se non c’è nessuno a bordo del tuo **veicolo personale**, puoi farlo svanire in sicurezza dal mondo di gioco in qualsiasi momento. Quale magia o scienza lo permette? Se il tuo **veicolo personale** è assente dal mondo di gioco e sei in un’area grande abbastanza da contenerlo, puoi eseguire l’azione di **Inventario** e spendere 2 Punti Inventario per farlo apparire a pochi passi da te e **salirvi** gratuitamente.
de: As long as there is no one aboard your personal vehicle, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your personal vehicle is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to have the vehicle appear near you and enter it for free.
pl: As long as there is no one aboard your personal vehicle, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your personal vehicle is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to have the vehicle appear near you and enter it for free.
fr: As long as there is no one aboard your personal vehicle, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your personal vehicle is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to have the vehicle appear near you and enter it for free.
es: As long as there is no one aboard your personal vehicle, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your personal vehicle is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to have the vehicle appear near you and enter it for free.
pt-BR: Contanto que não haja ninguém a bordo do seu veículo pessoal, você poderá fazer com que ele desapareça com segurança do mundo do jogo a qualquer momento. Que magia ou tecnologia permite isso? Se o seu veículo pessoal não estiver presente no mundo do jogo e você estiver em um espaço grande o suficiente para contê-lo, você pode realizar a ação de Inventário e gastar 2 PI para que o veículo apareça perto de você e entre nele de graça.

en: When you perform the Equipment or Guard action while driving your personal vehicle, you may choose up to 【SL】 of its enabled modules and disable them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and enable them.
it: Quando esegui l’azione di **Equipaggiamento** o di **Guardia**, se sei alla guida del tuo **veicolo personale**, puoi scegliere fino a 【**LA**】 tra i suoi moduli abilitati e **disabilitarli**; se lo fai, scegli altrettanti tra i suoi moduli disabilitati e **abilitali**.
de: When you perform the Equipment or Guard action while driving your personal vehicle, you may choose up to 【SL】 of its enabled modules and disable them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and enable them.
pl: When you perform the Equipment or Guard action while driving your personal vehicle, you may choose up to 【SL】 of its enabled modules and disable them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and enable them.
fr: When you perform the Equipment or Guard action while driving your personal vehicle, you may choose up to 【SL】 of its enabled modules and disable them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and enable them.
es: When you perform the Equipment or Guard action while driving your personal vehicle, you may choose up to 【SL】 of its enabled modules and disable them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and enable them.
pt-BR: Ao realizar a ação de Equipamento ou Guarda enquanto dirige seu veículo pessoal, você pode escolher até 【NH】 de seus módulos habilitados e desativá-los. Se você fizer isso, escolha uma quantidade igual de módulos desabilitados e ative-os.

en: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your personal vehicle, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or, the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by 【SL × 2】(applied before damage Affinities); or, you recover from a status effect of your choice among slow and weak.
it: All’inizio del tuo turno durante un conflitto, se sei alla guida del tuo **veicolo personale**, puoi spendere 10 PM. Se lo fai, scegli un’opzione: la prossima volta che infliggi danno durante questo turno, infliggi 【**LA × 2**】 danni extra; **oppure**, la prossima volta che subisci danno prima dell’inizio del tuo prossimo turno, quel danno è ridotto di 【**LA × 2**】 (**prima** di applicare le Affinità); **oppure**, guarisci da uno status a scelta tra **debole** e **lento**.
de: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your personal vehicle, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or, the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by 【SL × 2】(applied before damage Affinities); or, you recover from a status effect of your choice among slow and weak.
pl: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your personal vehicle, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or, the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by 【SL × 2】(applied before damage Affinities); or, you recover from a status effect of your choice among slow and weak.
fr: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your personal vehicle, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or, the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by 【SL × 2】(applied before damage Affinities); or, you recover from a status effect of your choice among slow and weak.
es: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your personal vehicle, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or, the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by 【SL × 2】(applied before damage Affinities); or, you recover from a status effect of your choice among slow and weak.
pt-BR: No início do seu turno durante um conflito, se você estiver dirigindo seu veículo pessoal, você poderá gastar 10 PM. Se fizer isso, escolha uma opção: na próxima vez que você causar dano durante este turno, cause 【NH × 2】 dano extra; ou, na próxima vez que você sofrer dano antes do início do seu próximo turno, esse dano será reduzido em 【NH × 2】 (aplicado antes das Afinidades de dano); ou você se recupera de um efeito de status de sua escolha entre lento e fraco.

en: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a personal vehicle with a frame of your choice and three different modules of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire two additional modules of your choice.
it: Quando acquisisci questa Abilità, ottieni un **veicolo personale** con una **struttura** a tua scelta e **tre moduli differenti** a tua scelta. Ogni volta che acquisisci nuovamente questa Abilità, ottieni **due moduli** a tua scelta.
de: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a personal vehicle with a frame of your choice and three different modules of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire two additional modules of your choice.
pl: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a personal vehicle with a frame of your choice and three different modules of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire two additional modules of your choice.
fr: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a personal vehicle with a frame of your choice and three different modules of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire two additional modules of your choice.
es: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a personal vehicle with a frame of your choice and three different modules of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire two additional modules of your choice.
pt-BR: Ao adquirir esta Habilidade, você ganha um veículo pessoal com quadro à sua escolha e três módulos diferentes à sua escolha. Sempre que adquirir esta Habilidade novamente, você adquire dois módulos adicionais à sua escolha.

en: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a weapon module, you may replace one of the Attributes with Might (such as 【MIG + WLP】 for an Arcane module).
it: Quando effettui un Test di Precisione con un **modulo arma**, puoi sostituire **uno** dei dadi di Caratteristica con **Vigore** (ad esempio 【**VIG + VOL**】 per un **modulo arcano**).
de: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a weapon module, you may replace one of the Attributes with Might (such as 【MIG + WLP】 for an Arcane module).
pl: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a weapon module, you may replace one of the Attributes with Might (such as 【MIG + WLP】 for an Arcane module).
fr: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a weapon module, you may replace one of the Attributes with Might (such as 【MIG + WLP】 for an Arcane module).
es: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a weapon module, you may replace one of the Attributes with Might (such as 【MIG + WLP】 for an Arcane module).
pt-BR: Ao realizar uma Verificação de Precisão com um módulo de arma, você pode substituir um dos Atributos por Vigor (como 【VIG + VON】 para um módulo Arcano).

en: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
it: Plasmi l’energia magica e proteggi i bersagli dalla furia degli elementi. Scegli un tipo di danno: aria, fulmine, fuoco, ghiaccio o terra. Finché questo incantesimo è attivo, ciascun bersaglio ottiene Resistenza al tipo di danno scelto.
de: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
pl: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
fr: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
es: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
pt-BR: Você tece energia mágica e protege os alvos da fúria dos elementos. Escolha um tipo de dano: ar, raio, terra, fogo ou gelo. Até que este feitiço termine, cada alvo ganha Resistência contra o tipo de dano escolhido.

en: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
it:
Infondi energia elementale in un’arma. Scegli un tipo di danno: aria, fulmine, fuoco, ghiaccio o terra. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, il danno inflitto dall’arma diventa del tipo scelto. Se hai quell’arma equipaggiata mentre lanci questo incantesimo, puoi eseguire un attacco gratuito con essa come parte della stessa azione.
Puoi lanciare questo incantesimo solo su armi equipaggiate da creature consenzienti.
de: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pl: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
fr: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
es: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pt-BR: Você imbui uma arma com energia elementar. Escolha um tipo de dano: ar, raio, terra, fogo ou gelo. Até que este feitiço termine, todo dano causado pela arma passa a ser do tipo de dano escolhido. Se você tiver aquela arma equipada enquanto lança esta magia, você pode realizar um ataque livre com ela como parte da mesma ação. Este feitiço só pode ser lançado em uma arma equipada por uma criatura voluntária.

en: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
it:
Scagli un singolo raggio di fuoco verso il nemico, così rovente da penetrare quasi ogni difesa. Il bersaglio subisce【TM + 25】 danni da fuoco.
I danni inflitti da questo incantesimo ignorano le Resistenze.
de: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pl: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
fr: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
es: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pt-BR: Você canaliza um único raio de fogo em direção ao seu inimigo, sua temperatura é tão alta que perfura a maioria das defesas. O alvo sofre 【HR + 25】 dano de fogo. O dano causado por este feitiço ignora as Resistências.

en: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 bolt damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
it:
Plasmi l’elettricità in un’onda di energia crepitante. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce 【TM + 15】 danni da fulmine.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status confuso.
de: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 bolt damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
pl: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 bolt damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
fr: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 bolt damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
es: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 bolt damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
pt-BR: Você transforma eletricidade em uma onda de raios crepitantes. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【HR + 15】 dano de raio. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço fica atordoado.

en: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR+ 15】 ice damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
it:
Ricopri i nemici con uno spesso strato di ghiaccio. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce 【TM + 15】 danni da ghiaccio.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status lento.
de: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR+ 15】 ice damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
pl: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR+ 15】 ice damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
fr: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR+ 15】 ice damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
es: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR+ 15】 ice damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
pt-BR: Você cobre seus inimigos com uma espessa camada de gelo. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【HR+ 15】 dano de gelo. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre lentidão.

en: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers【HR + 25】ice damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
it:
Una colonna di ghiaccio avvolge il nemico, abbassandone la temperatura corporea a livelli critici. Il bersaglio subisce【TM + 25】 danni da ghiaccio.
I danni inflitti da questo incantesimo ignorano le Resistenze.
de: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers【HR + 25】ice damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pl: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers【HR + 25】ice damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
fr: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers【HR + 25】ice damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
es: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers【HR + 25】ice damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pt-BR: Um pilar de magia de gelo envolve seu inimigo, diminuindo repentinamente a temperatura corporal dele a um nível crítico. O alvo sofre 【HR + 25】 dano de gelo. O dano causado por este feitiço ignora as Resistências.

en: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
it:
Evochi una pioggia di fiamme e la scateni sui tuoi nemici. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce【TM + 15】 danni da fuoco.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status scosso.
de: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
pl: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
fr: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
es: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
pt-BR: Você lança uma barragem devastadora contra seus inimigos, conjurando chamas do nada. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【HR + 15】 dano de fogo. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço fica abalado.

en: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
it:
Il vento trasposta i tuoi colpi attraverso il campo di battaglia. Puoi immediatamente esguire un attacco gratuito con un’arma da mischia equipaggiata. Questo attacco può
bersagliare creature che possono essere bersagliate solo da attacchi a distanza.
Se hai usato un’arma della Categoria lancia o da rissa per questo attacco, infligge 5 danni extra.
Se colpisci un bersaglio volante con questo attacco, puoi obbligarlo ad atterrare.
de: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
pl: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
fr: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
es: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
pt-BR: O vento carrega seus ataques pelo campo de batalha. Você pode realizar imediatamente um ataque livre com uma arma corpo a corpo que tenha equipado. Este ataque pode ter como alvo criaturas que só podem ser alvo de ataques à distância. Se você usou uma arma pertencente à categoria Luta ou Lança para este ataque, ela causa 5 de dano extra. Se você atingir um alvo voador com este ataque, poderá forçá-lo a pousar imediatamente.

en: Spires of jagged rock erupt from the ground beneath your foes, closing around them. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】earth damage. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell performs one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
it:
Guglie di pietra affilata sorgono dal terreno sotto i nemici, avvolgendoli. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce【TM + 15】 danni da terra. Questo incantesimo non può
bersagliare creature che stanno volando, fluttuando, cadendo o che si trovano a mezz’aria.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio colpito esegue un’azione in meno durante il suo prossimo turno (fino a un minimo di zero azioni).

Este feitiço não pode ter como alvo criaturas que estejam voando, flutuando, caindo ou de outra forma no ar. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço realiza uma ação a menos em seu próximo turno (até um mínimo de 0 ações).

en: You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers【HR + 25】bolt damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
it:
Scagli una saetta sfolgorante verso il nemico. Il bersaglio subisce【TM + 25】 danni da fulmine.
I danni inflitti da questo incantesimo ignorano le Resistenze.
de: You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers【HR + 25】bolt damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pl: You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers【HR + 25】bolt damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
