es: You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers【HR + 25】bolt damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pt-BR: Você envia um raio atingindo seu inimigo. O alvo sofre dano de raio 【HR + 25】. O dano causado por este feitiço ignora as Resistências.

en: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】air damage. Opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
it:
Evochi il potere dei venti contro i tuoi nemici. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce【TM + 15】 danni da aria.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio volante colpito deve atterrare immediatamente.
de: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】air damage. Opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
pl: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】air damage. Opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
fr: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】air damage. Opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
es: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】air damage. Opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
pt-BR: Você invoca o poder dos ventos contra seu inimigo. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【HR + 15】 dano aéreo. Oportunidade: Cada alvo voador atingido por este feitiço é forçado a pousar imediatamente.

en: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against ranged attacks.
it: Un vento feroce ti circonda, deviando frecce e proiettili. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ottieni un bonus di +2 alla tua Difesa contro gli attacchi a distanza.
de: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against ranged attacks.
pl: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against ranged attacks.
fr: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against ranged attacks.
es: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against ranged attacks.
pt-BR: Um vendaval forte envolve você, soprando flechas e balas. Até que esta magia termine, você ganha +2 de bônus em sua Defesa contra ataques à distância.

en: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
it: Pieghi il tessuto del tempo. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, il bersaglio può eseguire un’azione aggiuntiva durante ciascuno dei suoi turni. Dopo che il bersaglio ha eseguito due azioni aggiuntive in questo modo, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
pl: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
fr: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
es: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você dobra a estrutura do tempo. Até que esta magia termine, o alvo ganha a habilidade de realizar uma única ação adicional durante cada um de seus turnos. Uma vez que o alvo tenha realizado um total de duas ações adicionais concedidas por esta magia, esta magia termina.

en: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
it: Alteri la natura stessa del bersaglio. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, se il bersaglio subisce danni di un tipo che Assorbe o a cui è Immune, viene invece considerato Vulnerabile a essi. Quando ciò accade, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
pl: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
fr: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
es: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você altera a própria natureza do seu alvo. Até que este feitiço termine, se o alvo sofrer dano de um tipo que ele Absorve ou ao qual é Imune, ele será tratado como se fosse Vulnerável a esse tipo de dano. Quando isso acontecer, o feitiço termina.

en: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the dark type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
it:
Avvolgi un’arma nelle tenebre. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, tutto il danno inflitto dall’arma diventa ombra. Se hai quell’arma equipaggiata mentre lanci questo incantesimo,puoi eseguire un attacco gratuito con essa come parte della stessa azione.
Puoi lanciare questo incantesimo solo su armi equipaggiate da creature consenzienti.
de: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the dark type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pl: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the dark type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
fr: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the dark type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
es: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the dark type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pt-BR: Você imbui uma arma com energia sombria. Até que este feitiço termine, todo dano causado pela arma se torna do tipo Sombrio. Se você tiver aquela arma equipada enquanto lança esta magia, você pode realizar um ataque livre com ela como parte da mesma ação. Este feitiço só pode ser lançado em uma arma equipada por uma criatura voluntária.

en: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
it:
Un’onda di energia negativa spezza gli incantesimi presenti su una creatura. Se il bersaglio è sotto l’effetto di uno o più incantesimi con durata “Scena”, invece non è più
sotto l’effetto di quegli incantesimi.
de: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
pl: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
fr: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
es: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
pt-BR: Você libera uma onda de energia negativa e limpa toda a magia de uma criatura. Se o alvo for afetado por um ou mais feitiços com duração de Cena, ele não será mais afetado por nenhum desses feitiços.

en: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.
it: Hai una premonizione. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, dopo che una creatura a te visibile effettua un Test, se non è un fallimento critico o successo critico, puoi farle ritirare entrambi i dadi. Dopo aver causato due ritiri in questo modo, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.
pl: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.
fr: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.
es: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você vislumbra brevemente o futuro. Até que esta magia termine, depois que uma criatura que você pode ver realizar um Teste, se não foi um desastre nem um sucesso crítico, você pode forçar aquela criatura a rolar novamente ambos os dados. Depois de forçar duas novas jogadas desta forma, este feitiço termina.

en: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
it: Consumi la psiche di una creatura. Il bersaglio perde【TM + 15】 Punti Mente, e recuperi un ammontare di Punti Mente pari a metà dei Punti Mente persi dal bersaglio (se la perdita è stata ridotta a 0 in qualche modo, non recuperi Punti Mente).
de: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
pl: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
fr: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
es: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
pt-BR: Você consome a psique de uma criatura. O alvo perde 【HR + 15】 Pontos Mentais. Então, você recupera uma quantidade de Pontos Mentais igual à metade da perda de Pontos Mentais que eles sofreram (se a perda foi reduzida a 0 de alguma forma, você não recupera nenhum).

en: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
it: Assorbi la vitalità altrui. Il bersaglio subisce【TM + 15】 danni da ombra, e recuperi un ammontare di Punti Vita pari a metà dei Punti Vita persi dal bersaglio (se la perdita è stata ridotta a 0 in qualche modo, non recuperi Punti Vita).
de: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
pl: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
fr: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
es: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
pt-BR: Você rouba a força vital de outra criatura. O alvo sofre 【HR + 15】de dano sombrio. Então, você recupera uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida igual à metade da perda de Pontos de Vida que eles sofreram (se a perda foi reduzida a 0 de alguma forma, você não recupera nenhum).

en: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
it: Pieghi le leggi della magia. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, se un incantesimo offensivo (⚡) viene lanciato sul bersaglio, la creatura che ha lanciato l’incantesimo offensivo in questione viene bersagliata al suo posto (eventuali altri bersagli vengono bersagliati normalmente). Dopo che ciò accade, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
pl: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
fr: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
es: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você distorce as leis da magia. Até que este feitiço termine, se um feitiço ofensivo (⚡) for lançado no alvo, a criatura que lançou aquele feitiço ofensivo será o alvo em seu lugar (quaisquer outros alvos do feitiço ofensivo serão alvo normalmente). Quando isso acontecer, o feitiço termina.

en: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【20 + half the target's level】.
it: Condanni un nemico alla rovina, trasformandone la forza in debolezza. Il bersaglio perde un ammontare di Punti Vita pari a【20 + metà del livello del bersaglio】.
de: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【20 + half the target's level】.
pl: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【20 + half the target's level】.
fr: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【20 + half the target's level】.
es: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【20 + half the target's level】.
pt-BR: Você invoca a destruição de seu inimigo, transformando força em fragilidade. O alvo perde uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida igual a 【20 + metade do nível do alvo】.

en: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
it: Intrappoli il nemico in una bolla di tempo e spazio alterati. Il bersaglio esegue un’azione in meno durante il suo prossimo turno (fino a un minimo di zero azioni).
de: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
pl: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
fr: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
es: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
pt-BR: Você prende um inimigo dentro de um círculo de tempo e espaço alterados. O alvo realizará uma ação a menos no próximo turno (até um mínimo de 0 ações).

en: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
it:
Una tempesta di energie oscure sbriciola la materia. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce 【TM + 15】 danni da ombra.
Opportunità: Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status debole.
de: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
pl: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
fr: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
es: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
pt-BR: Uma tempestade de energia escura transforma matéria em cinzas. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【HR + 15】de dano sombrio. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre fraqueza.

en: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
it: Proietti il tuo spirito fuori dal corpo e lo usi per avvolgere i bersagli, proteggendoli dai pericoli della magia. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ciascun bersaglio può considerare la sua Difesa Magica pari a 12 contro qualsiasi effetto (può comunque utilizzare il suo normale valore di Difesa Magica nel caso sia maggiore di 12).
de: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
pl: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
fr: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
es: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
pt-BR: Você projeta sua alma fora do corpo e a direciona para cercar os alvos, protegendo-os de magia perigosa. Até que esta magia termine, cada alvo pode tratar sua Defesa Mágica como sendo igual a 12 contra quaisquer efeitos que o tenham como alvo (eles ainda estão livres para usar seu valor de Defesa normal se for maior que 12).

en: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).
it: Consenti a una creatura di concentrare la sua energia vitale perché sia in grado di superare i propri limiti. Scegli Destrezza, Intuito, Vigore o Volontà: fino al termine di questo incantesimo, il bersaglio considera la Caratteristica scelta incrementata di una taglia di dado (massimo d12).
de: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).
pl: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).
fr: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).
es: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).
pt-BR: Você permite que uma criatura concentre sua energia vital em realizar o que antes não conseguia. Escolha um Atributo: Destreza, Intuição, Vigor ou Vontade. Até que esta magia termine, o alvo trata o Atributo escolhido como se fosse um tamanho de dado maior (até um máximo de d12).

en: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
it: Proietti il tuo spirito fuori dal corpo e lo intrecci in una barriera che protegge i bersagli dagli attacchi. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ciascun bersaglio può considerare la sua Difesa come pari a 12 contro qualsiasi effetto (può comunque utilizzare il suo normale valore di Difesa nel caso sia maggiore di 12).
de: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
pl: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
fr: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
es: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
pt-BR: Você projeta sua alma fora do corpo e a transforma em uma barreira para proteger os alvos de ataques. Até que este feitiço termine, cada alvo pode tratar sua Defesa como sendo igual a 12 contra quaisquer efeitos que o tenham como alvo (eles ainda estão livres para usar seu valor de Defesa normal se for maior que 12).

en: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
it: Rafforzi e purifichi l’energia spirituale che scorre nei tuoi alleati. Ciascun bersaglio guarisce da tutti gli status.
de: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
pl: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
fr: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
es: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
pt-BR: Você fortalece e purifica a energia da alma que flui através de seus companheiros. Cada alvo se recupera de todos os efeitos de status.

en: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.
it: Spingi una creatura a perdere qualsiasi contegno e agire in maniera avventata. Il bersaglio subisce lo status furente e non può eseguire le azioni di Guardia e Incantesimo nel suo prossimo turno.
de: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.
pl: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.
fr: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.
es: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.
pt-BR: Você faz com que uma criatura perca qualquer aparência de temperança e aja descaradamente. O alvo fica enfurecido e não pode realizar as ações de Guarda ou Feitiço durante seu próximo turno.

en: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
it: Alteri la percezione dei tuoi nemici, insinuandovi allucinazioni bizzare o terrificanti. Scegli uno status tra confuso e scosso: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status scelto.
de: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
pl: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
fr: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
es: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
pt-BR: Você altera os sentidos de seus inimigos, fazendo-os experimentar alucinações bizarras ou assustadoras. Escolha atordoado ou abalado: você inflige o efeito de status escolhido em cada alvo atingido por este feitiço.

en: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
it: Infondi vigore nei tuoi compagni, lenendone il dolore e la stanchezza. Ciascun bersaglio recupera 40 Punti Vita. Questo ammontare aumenta a 50 Punti Vita se sei di livello 20 o superiore, oppure a 60 Punti Vita se sei di livello 40 o superiore.
de: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
pl: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
fr: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
es: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
pt-BR: Você revigora seus companheiros, acalmando suas dores e curando seu cansaço. Cada alvo recupera 40 PV. Essa quantidade aumenta para 50 PV se você estiver no nível 20 ou superior, ou para 60 PV se você estiver no nível 40 ou superior.

en: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
it:
Concentri la tua forza interiore in una salva di raggi accecanti. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce【TM + 15】 danni da luce.
Opportunità: Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status confuso.
de: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
pl: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
fr: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
es: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
pt-BR: Você concentra sua energia interior em uma barragem de raios ofuscantes da alma. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【HR + 15】de dano de luz. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço fica atordoado.

en: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
it: Infondi coraggio nel cuore di una creatura affinché resista alla sofferenza e alla disperazione. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, se il bersaglio sta per essere ridotto a 0 Punti Vita, rimane invece con esattamente 1 Punto Vita. Quando ciò accade, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
pl: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
fr: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
es: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você fortalece o coração de uma criatura contra o sofrimento e o desespero. Até que este feitiço termine, se o alvo for reduzido a 0 Pontos de Vida, ele permanecerá com exatamente 1 Ponto de Vida. Quando isso acontecer, o feitiço termina.

en: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
it: Proteggi i bersagli dai pericoli che ne corromperebbero l’animo e lo spirito. Scegli uno status tra avvelenato, confuso, debole, furente, lento e scosso: fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ciascun bersaglio diventa immune allo status scelto.
de: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
pl: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
fr: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
es: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
pt-BR: Você protege os alvos de ataques que corromperiam seu corpo e espírito. Escolha atordoado, enfurecido, envenenado, abalado, lento ou fraco. Até que este feitiço termine, cada alvo se torna imune ao efeito de status escolhido.

en: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
it:
Avvolgi un’arma con l’energia purificatrice del tuo spirito. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, tutto il danno inflitto dall’arma diventa luce. Se hai quell’arma equipaggiata mentre lanci questo incantesimo, puoi eseguire un attacco gratuito con essa come parte della stessa azione.
Puoi lanciare questo incantesimo solo su armi equipaggiate da creature consenzienti.
de: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pl: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
fr: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
es: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pt-BR: Você imbui uma arma com a energia purificadora do seu espírito. Até que este feitiço termine, todo dano causado pela arma se torna do tipo leve. Se você tiver aquela arma equipada enquanto lança esta magia, você pode realizar um ataque livre com ela como parte da mesma ação. Este feitiço só pode ser lançado em uma arma equipada por uma criatura voluntária.

en: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
it: Soffochi l’energia spirituale che attraversa i corpi dei tuoi nemici, ostacolandone i movimenti. Scegli uno status tra debole e lento: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status scelto.
de: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose Verlangsamt or Geschwächt: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
pl: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose slow or weak: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
fr: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose slow or weak: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
es: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose slow or weak: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
pt-BR: Você sufoca a energia da alma que percorre os corpos de seus inimigos, dificultando seus movimentos. Escolha lento ou fraco: você inflige o efeito de status escolhido em cada alvo atingido por este feitiço.

en: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
it: Perdi metà dei tuoi Punti Vita attuali e metà dei tuoi Punti Mente attuali.
de: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
pl: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
fr: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
es: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
pt-BR: Você perde metade dos seus Pontos de Vida atuais e metade dos seus Pontos Mentais atuais.

en: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers poisoned.
it: Ciascuna creatura presente in scena (te incluso) subisce lo status avvelenato.
de: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers poisoned.
pl: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers poisoned.
fr: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers poisoned.
es: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers poisoned.
pt-BR: Cada criatura presente na cena, inclusive você, sofre envenenamento.

en: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers slow.
it: Ciascuna creatura presente in scena (te incluso) subisce lo status lento.
de: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers slow.
pl: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers slow.
fr: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers slow.
es: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers slow.
pt-BR: Cada criatura presente na cena, inclusive você, sofre lentidão.

en: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
it: Scegli fino a tre creature a te visibili: ciascuna di esse recupera 50 Punti Vita e guarisce da tutti gli status.
de: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
pl: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
fr: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
es: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
pt-BR: Escolha até três criaturas que você possa ver: cada uma delas recupera 50 Pontos de Vida e também recupera todos os efeitos de status.

it: Scegli un qualsiasi numero di creature a te visibili: ciascuna di esse subisce 30 danni. Il tipo di danno viene determinato casualmente tirando un d6:
